story.title: Those Left Behind
story.author: Dark Horse Comics

world.description: Based on the Firefly television program

story.synopsis: The crew of the ship Serenity once again find themselves broke and on the wrong side of a number of very large firearms, making the first issue a case study in how to mix intense, Whedon-style character interaction with cinematic action and violence. Artist Will Conrad and colorist Laura Martin paint a rough and wild world of adventure across a strange and dangerous universe.

story.title: Better Days
story.author: Dark Horse Comics

world.description: Based on the Firefly television program

story.synopsis: Better Days revisits everyone's favorite space cowboys in this thrilling, action-packed adventure, with Mal and his crew on a heist that promises a big payoff—what's surprising is that this heist just might make good on that promise.

story.title: Falling Skies
story.author: Dark Horse Comics

world.description: Based on the Falling Skies television program

story.synopsis: In the heart of Boston, following the devastating events of an alien invasion, history professor Tom Mason and his sons Hal, Matt, and Ben are just trying to survive. After an extreme firefight with the aliens, Ben gets kidnapped. Determined to get his son back, Tom joins forces with the Second Mass, a militia group that is taking the fight against the aliens. But with the group’s munitions supplies running low, Tom must locate an old friend to equip himself and his team in order to ensure the survival of the human race!
